headline.main: U.S. ARTISTS DEPICTED TUNISIAN WAR SCENES; George Biddle, Attorney General's Brother, One of Group

lead_paragraph: TUNISIA, May 17 (By Mail) -- Easel set up on a Cap Bon roadside facing a poppy-sprinkled wheat field strewn with wrecked cars and dead horses. Artist George Biddle, brother of Attorney General Francis E. Biddle, was calmly sketching the scene of death and devastation the other day.
abstract: US War Artist Unit member G Biddle paints Tunis battle scene, Cap Bon area
